Package model

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Level
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Level Levels are loaded from XML file. The view knows the model, the controller is going to modify the model in function of the game panel. The model notifies the view when there are changes on it. The different XML level file are also saved in the project database
    Since:
    26-05-2019
    Author:
    Joress BADIENGUISSA
